card_text: "Elemental HERO Neos" + 1 "Ultimate Crystal" monster$NMust be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.$N●Send 1 monster you control to the GY; shuffle all monsters your opponent controls into the Deck.$N●Send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY; shuffle all Spells and Traps your opponent controls into the Deck.$N●Send 1 card from the top of your Deck to the GY; shuffle all cards from your opponent's GY into the Deck.
